title: Mocha Coffee "I Am Grounded" Affirmation Candle - 17.5 oz
description:
Stay centered and energized with the "I Am Grounded" Mocha Coffee Affirmation Candle, crafted to bring warmth and comfort to your space. Infused with the rich aroma of freshly brewed dark roast coffee, aromatic java bean, and creamy vanilla, this candle creates the perfect cozy ambiance.

Hand-poured in a reusable clear jar, this candle is made with coconut wax for a clean, long-lasting burn that is pet-friendly and vegan. Featuring two flat braided cotton wicks (lead and zinc-free), it offers a smooth, even burn for up to 60+ hours.
